page.title: 20PUBLIC FIGURES OF FERNESS
page.content: Glenferness House(just outwith our area) was completed in 1844. It was bought, together with Glenferness estate, 25 years later by the Earl of Leven and Melville. It has remained in the family ever since. The estate provides local employment and Lord and Lady Leven are prominent in local affairs. Robert Thomson was a teacher at Ferness school from 1874 to 1900.His interest in wildlife, local history & customs led him to publish 'The Natural History of a Highland Parish'- an invaluable source of information about the Ferness area. AUTHORS & CHILDREN INVOLVED IN COLLECTING INFORMATION: Mrs. B. Love, Miss M. Mackintosh, Neil Riddoch, Emma & Calum Lines, Lorraine, Jimmy & Ian Scott, Calum & Rory Baikie, Timmy Hinde, Marc Sturrock, David MacBean.
